meaningMnemonic: 効果 means "effect," so the <kanji>opposite</kanji> of said effect is the <vocabulary>opposite effect</vocabulary>. Or in other terms, something <vocabulary>counterproductive</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as  well. Will help to know 効果 as well.
